Package edu.escuelaing.arsw.ASE.back.repository

Interface PlayerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Player,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Player,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Player,Integer>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Player,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Player,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Player>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Player,Integer>
public interface PlayerRepository extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.MongoRepository<Player,Integer>
Repository interface for Player entities. This interface provides methods for interacting with the Player collection in MongoDB.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Player
    findById(int mongodb)
    Finds a player by their MongoDB ID.
    List<Player>
    findByScore()
    Finds all players and returns only their names and scores, sorted by score in descending order.

  • Method Details

    • findByScore

      @Query(value="{}", fields="{\'name\': 1, \'score\': 1}", sort="{\'score\': -1}") List<Player> findByScore()
      Finds all players and returns only their names and scores, sorted by score in descending order.
      Returns:
      a list of players with their names and scores

    • findById

      Player findById(int mongodb)
      Finds a player by their MongoDB ID.
      Parameters:
      mongodb - the MongoDB ID of the player
      Returns:
      the player with the specified ID, or null if no player is found
